content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 11 Oct 2018What are some important notes to take away before starting on Day Trading?1 answerAnswerBump0

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 12 Oct 2018Have a trading system in place. Ensure that the probability to win is there after rigorous testing. Not every day will be a winning day; there will bound to be days where there are straight losses. Take these on the chin and carry on trading. Trust your system and strategies. 0 comments0
